clinicalSynopsis.inheritance: Autosomal recessive {SNOMEDCT:258211005} {UMLS C0441748 HP:0000007} {HPO HP:0000007 C0441748,C4020899}
clinicalSynopsis.headAndNeckFace: Prematurely aged face {UMLS C1857710 HP:0005328} {HPO HP:0005328 C1857710}
clinicalSynopsis.headAndNeckNose: Beaked nose {UMLS C0240538 HP:0000444} {HPO HP:0000444 C0240538}
clinicalSynopsis.cardiovascularHeart: Premature arteriosclerosis {UMLS C1848486 HP:0005177} {HPO HP:0005177 C1848486,C4280503}
clinicalSynopsis.skinNailsHairHair: Thin, sparse, gray {UMLS C1848484}; Premature balding {UMLS C1848485}
clinicalSynopsis.endocrineFeatures: Diabetes mellitus {SNOMEDCT:73211009} {ICD10CM:E08-E13} {ICD9CM:250} {UMLS C0011849 HP:0000819} {HPO HP:0000819 C0011849}; Hypogonadism {SNOMEDCT:48130008} {UMLS C0020619 HP:0000135} {HPO HP:0000135 C0020619}
clinicalSynopsis.neoplasia: Malignancy in approximately 10% {UMLS C1848478}; Osteosarcoma and meningioma especially {UMLS C1848479}
clinicalSynopsis.laboratoryAbnormalities: Variegated translocation mosaicism in cultured fibroblasts {UMLS C1848481}; Poor mitogenic response to growth factors {UMLS C1848482}
clinicalSynopsis.molecularBasis: Caused by mutation in the RecQ protein-like 2 gene (RECQL2, {604611.0001})
